item.title: Mysql学习笔记
item.description: 安装 MySql 服务 mac 1 brew install mysql linux 1 2 3 4 sudo apt-get insatll mysql-server sudo apt-get install mysql-client chsh -s `which zsh` 修改密码 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 sudo mysqld_safe --skin-grant-tables --skip-networking & > use mysql > update user set authentication_string=password('新密码'), plugin='mysql_native_password' where user = 'root' > flush privileges > quit 启动 MySql 服务 mac 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 # 启动mysql服务 mysql.
